statements: SELECT * FROM food_and_wine_pairings;
SELECT food_name, wine_name, pairing_description FROM food_and_wine_pairings;
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE wine_id = 1;
SELECT food_name, pairing_description FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE food_id = 3;
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE pairing_description LIKE '%tannins%';
SELECT * FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE food_id = 1;
SELECT wine_name, food_name FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE wine_id = 5;
SELECT food_name, wine_name, pairing_description FROM food_and_wine_pairings ORDER BY food_name DESC;
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE food_name LIKE '%Salad%';
SELECT wine_name, pairing_description FROM food_and_wine_pairings WHERE food_name = 'Steak' ORDER BY wine_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_pairings WHERE food_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wine_pairings WHERE wine_id = 3;
SELECT food_name, wine_name, pairing_rating FROM food_pairings JOIN wine_pairings ON food_pairings.wine_id = wine_pairings.wine_id;
SELECT food_name, pairing_description FROM food_pairings WHERE wine_id IS NULL;
SELECT food_name, wine_name, pairing_rating FROM food_pairings JOIN wine_pairings ON food_pairings.wine_id = wine_pairings.wine_id WHERE food_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM food_pairings WHERE food_id = 1;
SELECT food_name, wine_name, pairing_description, pairing_rating FROM food_pairings, wine_pairings WHERE food_id = wine_id;
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM food_pairings INNER JOIN wine_pairings ON food_pairings.food_id = wine_pairings.food_id;
SELECT food_name, pairing_description FROM food_pairings WHERE food_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY food_id DESC;
SELECT food_name, wine_name, pairing_description FROM food_pairings LEFT JOIN wine_pairings ON food_pairings.food_id = wine_pairings.food_id;
SELECT * FROM Food WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT food_name, cuisine_type FROM Food WHERE food_id = 3;
SELECT wine_name FROM Wine WHERE region = 'France';
SELECT food_name, cuisine_type, wine_name FROM Food JOIN Pairings ON Food.food_id = Pairings.food_id JOIN Wine ON Pairings.wine_id = Wine.wine_id;
SELECT food_id, wine_name FROM Pairings JOIN Wine ON Pairings.wine_id = Wine.wine_id WHERE food_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Food;
SELECT food_name, cuisine_type FROM Food WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT wine_name, region FROM Wine WHERE region = 'France';
SELECT Food.food_name, Wine.wine_name, Wine.region FROM Food INNER JOIN Pairings ON Food.food_id = Pairings.food_id INNER JOIN Wine ON Pairings.wine_id = Wine.wine_id;

SELECT Food.food_name, Wine.wine_name, Wine.region FROM Food INNER JOIN Pairings ON Food.food_id = Pairings.food_id INNER JOIN Wine ON Pairings.wine_id = Wine.wine_id WHERE Food.cuisine_type = 'Mexican';
SELECT * FROM food;
SELECT food_name, cuisine_type FROM food WHERE cuisine_type='Italian';
SELECT wine_name, grape_variety FROM wine WHERE grape_variety='Chardonnay';
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM food f JOIN pairing p ON f.food_id = p.food_id JOIN wine w ON p.wine_id = w.wine_id;
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM review WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT food_id, food_name, cuisine_type FROM food WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY food_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT food_name FROM food JOIN pairing ON food.food_id = pairing.food_id WHERE pairing.pairing_id IN (SELECT pairing_id FROM review WHERE rating >= 4);

SELECT food.food_name, wine.wine_name, pairing.pairing_notes FROM food JOIN pairing ON food.food_id = pairing.food_id JOIN wine ON pairing.wine_id = wine.wine_id WHERE food.cuisine_type = 'French' AND wine.grape_variety = 'Merlot';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_pairings FROM pairing WHERE pairing_id IN (SELECT pairing_id FROM review WHERE rating IS NULL);

SELECT review.review_id, review.rating, review.review_text FROM review JOIN pairing ON review.pairing_id = pairing.pairing_id JOIN wine ON pairing.wine_id = wine.wine_id WHERE wine.grape_variety = 'Chardonnay' ORDER BY review.rating DESC, review.review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Food;
SELECT food_name, food_type FROM Food WHERE food_id = 1;
SELECT wine_name FROM Wine WHERE wine_type = 'Red';
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM Food f JOIN Pairing p ON f.food_id = p.food_id JOIN Wine w ON p.wine_id = w.wine_id;
SELECT w.wine_name, f.food_name FROM Pairing p JOIN Wine w ON p.wine_id = w.wine_id JOIN Food f ON p.food_id = f.food_id ORDER BY w.wine_name ASC;
SELECT food_id, food_name, food_type FROM Food ORDER BY food_name DESC;
SELECT wine_name, wine_type FROM Wine WHERE wine_type = 'Red Wine';
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM Food JOIN Pairing ON Food.food_id = Pairing.food_id JOIN Wine ON Pairing.wine_id = Wine.wine_id;
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM Food JOIN Pairing ON Food.food_id = Pairing.food_id JOIN Wine ON Pairing.wine_id = Wine.wine_id WHERE Food.food_type = 'Dessert';
SELECT food_name, wine_name FROM Food JOIN Pairing ON Food.food_id = Pairing.food_id JOIN Wine ON Pairing.wine_id = Wine.wine_id WHERE Pairing.pairing_id > 3;
